title: A web app to interactively explore the electricity usage
description: In this tutorial, I show how to use my web app to explore user-submitted electricity usage data.
contents: My app allows for interactive exploration of the electricity usage. You can better understand how you are using your own electricity. Perhaps you will find out how to make your energy usage more efficient and help to become more environmentally friendly and save some money at the same time!

title: An R-package to study the Pokemon GO data
description: Pokémon Go is a 2016 augmented reality mobile game. We collected some citizen reported data to find out where it is best to catch rare Pokemons.
contents: In this R-package, we include the citizen reported data….
